name: Spracht ZUM 3500 3.5 and USB universal headest on-ear | Dell USA
description: Bass-enhanced speakers deliver excellent sound quality. Combined with a noise canceling microphone, they deliver a high-quality sound experience. They have Plug and Play compatibility for all systems so no special software or drivers are needed. The in-line controls put the user in charge of their sound experience. Professional quality materials make this headset durable as well as comfortable. Just plug them in and they're ready to use.
